new__paragraph-1.message: We’re working hard to make the Adblock Plus extension more valuable for you. Here’s a little about what we’ve been doing lately:

new__item-1__paragraph-1.message: Our latest update now gives us the ability to block ads in Japanese and Turkish. If you’d like to block ads in these languages, simply enable these filter lists by heading to Settings and adding a new language filter list.

new__item-2__paragraph-1.message: We’ve invested in our infrastructure in the face of future internet changes like Manifest V3. With this update, we’re working to ensure that Adblock Plus continues to provide users with a better internet experience now and beyond.
